DOC.criteria: Adult patient schedule elective surgery expect duration > 2 hour Healthy patient undergo moderate surgery use N2O unproblematic Contraindication N2O ( pneumothorax , mechanical bowel obstruction , middle ear occlusion , laparoscopic surgery , raise intracranial pressure ) Patients require supplemental oxygen Urgent emergent surgery Patients vitamin B12 folate deficiency megaloblastic anemia Patients seizure disorder ( epilepsy ) Allergy hypersensitivity IV cobalamin folate Patients Leber 's disease ( hereditary optic nerve atrophy ) Patients take supplemental vitamin B12 folate
